Text.Page: <PCNAME>. Are you ready to make a <font color='#0000FF'>Freeholds Specialty</font> drink?
You heard that Haroso had the missing ingredient for a <font color='#0000FF'>Freeholds Specialty</font> drink.

To make a Freeholds Specialty drink, you need a Tuwangi's Tear.

You can get one from Haroso at Tuwangi Mire.
A friend of Melsa is a friend of mine! What do you need?<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"I came for a Tuwangi's Tear."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
<font color='#FF0000'>Tuwangi's Tear</font> is a very rare item! I can't simply just give it away...even to a friend!<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Is there anything I can do?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
Do me a favor and I'll give you the <font color='#FF0000'>Tuwangi's Tear</font>!<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"What kind of favor?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
I love Dragon on a Stick, but it's Dragon on a Sick now! I had too much! I want something new!<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"What do you want?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
<font color='#0000FF'>Moongourd Muffins</font> are delicious! Thank you!
Where's the <font color='#0000FF'>Moongourd Muffin</font>...
<font color='#0000FF'>Popped Cobseed</font> is delicious! Thank you!
Where's the <font color='#0000FF'>Popped Cobseed</font>...
<font color='#0000FF'>Mudroot Salad</font> is delicious! Thank you!
Where's the <font color='#0000FF'>Mudroot Salad</font>...
<font color='#0000FF'>Grilled Pigling</font> is delicious! Thank you!
Where's the <font color='#0000FF'>Grilled Pigling</font>...
<font color='#0000FF'>Shevranberry Cookies</font> are delicious! Thank you!
Where's the <font color='#0000FF'>Shevranberry Cookie</font>...
Thank you! That was a feast! But I'm still hungry...haha!

Thank you for everything!

Since you helped, I'll give you this as a gift!
Where's the <font color='#0000FF'>Traditional Bleakfields BBQ</font>...

Thank you for everything!

Since you helped, I'll give you this as a gift!
Where's the <font color='#0000FF'>Freeholds Flame Salad</font>...

Thank you for everything!

Since you helped, I'll give you this as a gift!
Where's the <font color='#0000FF'>Bleak Wings</font>...
